properties.address: St. Josephs Presbytery, Lancashire BL9 6AB
properties.description: Red Door is a day centre for people who are homeless or at risk of homelessness in Bury. We provide a warm welcome to anyone over 18 and provide holistic support including helping with housing, finance/benefits and health issues, with a big focus on wellbeing. We also provide free nutritious meals and a warm hub where people can socialise and receive support. Please note our entrance is accessed via the presbytery carpark on Bold Street.
properties.title: Red Door

properties.address: All Souls - Bolton,, Bolton, England BL1 8EY
properties.description: All Souls is a beautiful historic church that has been converted for use as a conference, office, learning and community space. As part of this work, the original building was carefully restored. Renovation work began in September 2013 and was completed during November 2014. Established by the Greenhalgh brothers in 1881 for the wellbeing of the surrounding community, All Souls will now extend this welcome to a new generation, offering the latest facilities combined with the warm professionalism of our team. All Souls’ place at the heart of the Crompton community makes it the ideal base for local services, activities and events. Its unique beauty makes it a fine place to gain a greater understanding of the heritage of the church and its surroundings. All Souls is open Monday to Friday from 9am till 5pm. Occasionally for events we are open in the evenings and at weekends. All Souls - Bolton is managed by The Churches Conservation Trust, which is a national charity caring for over 350 historic churches in England.
properties.title: Richard Miller

properties.address: Church Of The Nazarene, Greater Manchester BL1 3UR
properties.description: Roots in Fresh Ground is a community cafe space, which works alongside Bolton at Home to offer a pop-up urban care and neighbourhood centre. In addition we offer a Talkin Tables space, through which we aim to reduce isolation and empower people to connect with one another.

properties.description: We offer a warm welcoming space to everyone. We offer a service to all ages with free access to books, computers, Wi-Fi and online resources such as Ancestry. We also offer a range of electronic books and audio books and digital magazines that can be accessed free of charge. All of our Libraries have regular activity sessions for adults and children. For more information please contact your local library.
